course_title: Fresh Sem: Psychology: Images of Mind: Neuroimaging
class_notes: (Freshmen Seminar - Limited to First Year Students Only)
course_description: Small class experience on topics of current psychological interest that fosters a highly interactive and mutually collaborative learning environment involving freshmen and faculty members. Topics include clinical, neuroscience, animal behavior, social, development and cognition.
schedule_location: W 2:30pm-5:30pm in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E103
sections: Class Nbr: 2918, Section #: 6, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: S. Hamann, Status: Open
